Today in County Sligo, surf is looking solid with 8 ft @ 12s WNW swell and light 10 mph WSW winds. Strandhill and Easkey spots are clean and working well, especially during their prime tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 5 ft @ 10s WNW with fresh 22 mph SE winds, making it poor across the board. On the day after, we see a rebound to 7 ft @ 15s WNW with light 7 mph SSE winds, offering better options at Strandhill and Easkey. Best: today.
